author: Kenneth Bareuther
comment: Using it with moto 360 and HTC one M7. It seems that GPS is running constantly with address tracking on. This will consume a lot of battery 🔋? And it is difficult to push Ring at the bottom of the Moto 360. At last I think it is a bit slow in detection of loss of Bluetooth.
title: Nice app, but...

author: Aman Agrawal
comment: Guys, If you have a tendency to forget your phone at home while going out, or if you are like me who always has trouble to find your phone at home like sometimes it is under the mattress, or in the bathroom, etc., etc...  You surely need this app, and you will love it!! :)

reply.author: iProgrammer
reply.content: Thank you for your valuable feedback. It means a lot!

title: Highly Recommended!!

author: Wade Sykora
comment: Does what I would expect and looks good doing it. I would love to see this app get a feature that locks the phone when watch becomes disconnected and unlocks when reconnected. Otherwise great app to go with.

reply.author: iProgrammer
reply.content: Hi Wade, thank you for your feedback. We do have plans for introducing the phone lock feature along with a lot more useful functionalities. Please watch this space for more updates and upgrades :)

title: Very clean UI

author: Dave Smart
comment: Please optimize for the moto 360. The screen is cut off.

reply.author: iProgrammer
reply.content:
Hi Dave,
Thank you for your feedback. Would you please send us a snapshot of what and how is it getting cut on moto360? We would love to update the app to make it more useful for you and your cooperation in the same will be of outmost value. Thank you for trying our app, we are committed to make it useful for all our valuable users.

title: Moto360

author: Ruwan de Silva
comment: Trying to setup on samsung S7 edge. Asked for the email address after stallation. When press submit, says 'No internet connection available' though it is connected to the internet. Cannot proceed further.
title: Cannot get to work

author: Jeremy Mayhew
comment: Works very well. One of the best find my phone apps for wear... But it seems to be a big battery hog. It's always the leading cause of my low battery in the middle of the day.

reply.author: iProgrammer
reply.content: Hi Jeremy, thank you for your feedback. In order for the Wear device to work, the Bluetooth has to be kept on constantly which is a huge drain on the battery. We have tested the app though to ensure its battery consumption is at minimal. We are continuously trying to make our app even more efficient to further bring down our resource consumption.

title: Works well... Battery hog

author: Brent Buxton
comment: Opens to screen asking for email. Gives error no Internet. I have Internet

author: Dinico Win
comment: Lg g watch R. HTC one m8. Only after I swipe the "ring" screen away, does it begun to ring my phone
title: No click reaction

reply.author: iProgrammer
reply.content: Hi Chris, The app works with only Android Wear powered devices. Samsung Galaxy S, is not based on Android Wear OS, hence the application shall not work on the same.

author: Alex Sak
comment: Works as says,great app,where it says ring is cutoff though on the roundface.

reply.author: iProgrammer
reply.content: Hi Alex, Thank you for your help in identifying the problem with Moto360. A fix is in progress and we shall soon be sending an update to resolve the issue.

title: Moto360

author: Nagesh Pendiyal
comment: Works as expected.  And the address feature is nice to have .

reply.author: iProgrammer
reply.content: Hi Nagesh, thank you for your feedback.

title: Good usability

author: Rohan Naik
comment: Its the only wear app which gives me last known location of my phone.

reply.author: iProgrammer
reply.content: Thank you for your kind feedback! Glad to know you like our location feature.

title: Must to have app

author: Santy
comment: Must have app for all who have smartwatch.

reply.author: iProgrammer
reply.content: Thank you Santosh. Glad you liked our application.

title: Must have app !!!

author: Rajesh G
comment: Keeps saying no internet connection available. Does work
title: Does not work in Samsung galaxy s5

author: Krishna Kanth Reddy
comment: Keeps GPS of the phone always on for tracking. Sucks the battery life heavily.
title: Sucks the battery life

author: Gaurav Agrawal
comment: This is best of the best aap I founde

reply.author: iProgrammer
reply.content: Thank you for your kind feedback!

title: Best of The best

reply.author: iProgrammer
reply.content: Hi Tushar, Thank you for your kind feedback.
